description:
MultiSport is now digital!

*Please note that this app is in its early stages. You may encounter temporary issues while visiting facilities and registering visits digitally. If this occurs, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Additionally, once you activate your virtual card, your plastic MultiSport card will no longer be valid.

Switch to a virtual card within the app and use a QR code for check-ins at sports facilities.

Here's how:
1. Create a profile on MyMultiSport, or if you're already registered, simply log in.
2. Verify your mobile number.
3. Upload a picture of yourself.
4. Generate a QR code for digital entry to all MultiSport facilities!
5. Find your sport and the perfect place to stay active!

The app helps you locate all facilities where your MultiSport card can be used.

Explore various sports venues and find your ideal spot to exercise.

Your real-time scores and stats app, fast and simple.

• As fast as a sports app can be. Get updates in real time with Live Activities on your Lock Screen or on match pages with odds, scores, play-by-play and more.
• Follow teams, leagues, divisions and tournaments, and personalise your home view in the app.
• Add a widget to your Home Screen to get quick access to scores and upcoming schedules.
• The best place to be a fan. Watch live matches on Apple TV or catch up on breaking stories with Apple News when you sync your sports.
• Includes Bundesliga, Bundesliga 2, Champions League, Conference League, EFL Championship, EFL Cup, Europa League, F1, FA Cup, FBS and FCS NCAA College Football, LaLiga, Leagues Cup, LIGA MX, Ligue 1, Ligue 2, Men’s College Basketball, Men’s Tennis, MLB, MLS, NASCAR, NBA, NFL, NHL, NWSL, Primeira Liga, Premier League, Segunda División, Serie A, Serie B, WNBA, Women’s Champions League, Women’s College Basketball and Women’s Tennis.

Requirements:
• Availability and features may vary by country, region or device.
• Apple Sports is free to use and is available for all iPhone models using iOS 17.2 or later.
• Features require internet access over a Wi-Fi or mobile data connection.

A fast, user-friendly and advanced betting app for your mobile and tablet.
With Betano's iOS app for iPhone and iPad, Sports Betting, Slots and Esports are just a tap away! Betano offers exciting features such as SpeedBet, MyLive and many others that will bring your game to a whole new level!

- Sports Betting and Slots
Betano has hundreds of markets available. In addition, you can also enjoy the best slots and table games*. Everything in one place!
*Not applicable to users based in Germany.

- Missions
Betano’s loyalty programme, full of missions and surprises!

- Bonuses
Take part in our missions, complete the challenges and win special bonuses to enjoy the best of sports betting!

- Bet Mentor
The simplest and fastest way to place multiple bets. Bet Mentor provides suggestions on football bets, based on your stake and desired winnings.

- Live Tables*
Blackjack, Roulette, Poker, Baccarat are just a few of the games you can play live.
*Not applicable to users based in the Czech Republic, Germany and Portugal.

- Virtuals*
Can’t get enough of the sports action? Virtual Sports opens up a whole new world of endless betting possibilities 24/7!
*Applicable only to users based in Romania, Bulgaria, Brazil, Peru, Ecuador, Chile, Ontario Province, Nigeria, Buenos Aires Province (Argentina), Mexico and Belgium.

- Share Your Bet
As soon as you place your bet, you can share it with your friends for them to place the same bet with just one tap!

- Smart Notifications
The latest updates on your matches and the settlement of your bets!

- Live Streaming*
Live matches from the top leagues and competitions on your mobile (T&Cs apply)
*Not applicable to users based in Germany and Nigeria.

- Fantasy*
Daily and long-term Fantasy tournaments in top events and leagues on your mobile screen.
*Applicable only to users based in Bulgaria, Nigeria, Czechia, Ontario, Mexico, Buenos Aires Province (Argentina) and Chile.

- Bet Builder/Same Game Parlay
Combine different markets of the same match in a single bet!

The team at EfBet.com welcome you to their App. We hope you have a great time exploring our exciting world of sports betting, including In-Play Betting, and our extensive casino games opportunities. 

Trusted
======

If you are an existing customer, you will know that EfBet.com have been trusted in the betting and gaming market for over 10 years. During that time we have built an excellent reputation founded upon value, service and reliability. If you are a new customer, we hope you enjoy as much as our existing customers the extensive sports betting and online casino opportunities that you will find within this App.

Please take the time to rate the EfBet.com App. Your valuable feedback – both good and bad – is the only way we can continue to make improvements to both our sports betting and online casino products and services. You talk, we listen – and that’s the way it will always be.

Here are the great features you will find in the EfBet.com App:

Sports betting 
===========

-	Thousands of sports betting markets across popular sports such as Football, Horse Racing, Tennis, Basketball, Motor sports, Rugby, Golf, and Cricket 

-	Bet In-Play on sports, or bet pre-match – the choice is yours. We have all betting options covered

-	If you already have an online account with EfBet.com, your login details work with the EfBet.com App. There is no need to re-register your details

-	Quick and easy Deposit and Withdrawal facilities in a safe, secure and reliable environment

-	Regular free bet/casino credit promotions for both our sports betting and casino products. Once you’ve bet with us, you will understand why our great value offers are considered the best in the business

-	Best Odds Guaranteed


Live Scoreboards
=============

Keep up to date with the latest scores for all live football matches by using our Live Scoreboard service. You will have access to the following information: 

 > Match Start/Half Time/End.
 > Yellow cards.
 > Players sent off
 > Substitutions
 > Goals
 > Corners
 > Live Match timer.
 
Favourites Centre
==============

The Favourites Centre is a quick and easy way of keeping track on the upcoming football matches you have a particular interest in. You can set up alerts to remind you when a match is taking place by simply touching an event and sliding your finger to the right. This adds the football match to your Favourites Centre. Easy!


Casino Games
===========

We have a huge range of Casino games for you to enjoy on your Mobile. Choose from Classic Casino games such as Blackjack, Roulette or Baccarat and large variety of fantastic casino branded games by Microgaming Limited and EGT that you can enjoy.

EfBet.com.

Опитайте ново онлайн казино и спортни залагания в България в приложението MrBit. Бонус за добре дошли за регистрация за всички нови играчи, топ слотове и залози с истински пари на футбол, тенис, баскетбол и много други. Повече от 30 популярни доставчици на казино игри: Amusnet (EGT), 7777 Gaming, Pragmatic Play, Fazi, Habanero, Wazdan. 

Спортни залагания

Харесваш ли спорта?
 Следвайте всички основни спортни събития и мачове и правете залози за тях с няколко кликвания! Предлагат се залози преди мача и залози на живо. Отлични коефициенти, бързо теглене на печалби.
Приложението предоставя календар със спортни събития, така че да не пропуснете играта на любимия си футболен отбор или важен баскетболен мач.

Можете да залагате на различни спортни събития:

- Евро
- България. Лига 1
- Висша лига
- Лига на нациите на УЕФА
- Лига Европа УЕФА
- Шампионската лига на УЕФА
- Лига на конференциите УЕФА
- НБА
- НХЛ

Приложението предлага и залози на виртуални спортове и инструмента Bet Builder, който ви позволява да изчислявате залози поотделно и на няколко спорта едновременно. 
Има бонус за добре дошли за нови играчи. Освен това в приложението редовно се добавя и актуализира информация за промоции. Включете известията и първо научете за промоционални сделки.

Казино игри

С едно кликване в приложението са достъпни повече от 1700 слот машини. Включително игри с дилър на живо: рулетка, блекджек, бакара. Освен това в приложение MrBit налични класически ротативки с плодове, игри с джакпоти и казино игри с бонуси вътре. Безплатни демо версии на слотове са достъпни в секцията Нови игри.

В приложението за онлайн казино MrBit можете да намерите тези популярни игрални машини:

- Shining Hot 20
- Rise of Ra
- Book of Tut
- Bulgarian Roulette
- Live Roulette
- Baccarat
- Blackjack
- Aviator

18+, Играйте отговорно
Асоциация Солидарност за рехабилитация от зависимост - https://www.solidarnost-bg.org, тел. 0888-99-18-66
За пълните правила и условия, моля, следвайте връзката към уебсайта на програмиста по-долу.

The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.


Terms of Use: https://livesport.eu/terms-of-use/en-gb
Privacy Policy: https://livesport.eu/privacy-policy/en-gb

Welcome to bet365’s most advanced sports betting app yet! Available on iPhone and iPad. Download the betting app today and find out why it’s Never Ordinary at bet365.

Official Sponsor of the UEFA Champions League

Bet on a wide range of In-Play and pre-match sports including Premier League, Champions League, Horse Racing, NFL and Formula 1.

bet365 customers can enjoy an unrivalled user experience including:
· Super Boosts: Get our BIGGEST prices on selected markets with Super Boost. 

· Winnings Boosts: BOOST your winnings on featured sports and events for Bet Builders and selected single bets - increasing your winnings without increasing your stake.

· Bet Boosts: Every day we BOOST hundreds of markets on a vast array of Sports. Events with Bet Boosts available will be indicated by two green chevrons.

· Bet Builder+: Combine the most popular markets from selected events into one bet. Our user-friendly interface has everything in one place so you can build the bet you want. Available pre-match and In-Play on a wide range of fantastic sports.

· Free Games: Enter free-to-play games such as 6 Scores Challenge, 6 Horses Challenge, Goals Giveaway & more. Play for your chance to win prizes for free! 

· Fantasy Sports: Gives you numerous ways to play, including Full Season and Weekly Tournaments with varying entry prices and prizes. 

· In-Play Betting: Bet on tens of thousands of In-Play markets across a wide range of sports such as: American Football, Soccer and Basketball.

· Live Streaming: bet365 streams hundreds of thousands of events worldwide every year, bringing top quality live sporting action straight to your device wherever you are. Featuring events globally from major Soccer leagues, the NBA, NFL & more.

· Match Live: Follow In-Play events live and monitor your bets and stats as the action unfolds. Available on a wide range of fantastic sports.

· Live Golf Tracker: Follow every drive, iron and putt from your favourite players in some of the biggest Golf competitions in the world from the PGA TOUR and DP World Tour.

· Sports Stats: Study the stats for major leagues across the globe including American Football, Soccer and Basketball.

· Personalised Display: Easily navigate to your preferred sports as our intuitive App will show you the type of sports you bet on. You can also favourite specific sports via the A-Z Sports menu for easy access.

· My Teams: Our dedicated My Teams page allows you to quickly place your Soccer bets and view upcoming fixtures for your favourite teams.

· Sports Betting & News: Keep up to date with the very latest news across a wide range of sports and get extra betting insights from our talent and tipsters.

· bet365 Extra: View our extensive range of offers and promotions.

· Search: Use our search facility to quickly find the sport, league, event or market you want to bet on.

· Face ID: Access your account securely within seconds. Only available on supported devices.

· Choose from a wide range of payment methods including Debit Card, PayPal and Apple Pay.

· Use your existing bet365 account or sign up via the app


You must be 18 or over to have a bet365 account
Availability may differ by location
Tell us what you think, rate our app today!

bet365 is committed to Responsible Gambling.
We have a range of tools available that are designed to help you to stay in control of your betting such as Time-Outs, Deposit Limits, Reality Checks, Self-Exclusion and others

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

LIVESCORE BET – ОПТИМАЛНО ПРИЛОЖЕНИЕ ЗА СПОРТНИ ЗАЛОЗИ
LiveScore Bet е бързо и лесно за употреба приложение за спортни залози преди мачовете и на живо по време на играта. Със стотици пазари за футбол, волейбол, тенис, баскетбол и дори игри на живо в казиното, ние предлагаме различни възможности за залагане.

ЗАЛАГАНЕ НА ПЪРВА ЛИГА И НА ВИСШАТА ЛИГА
Подробни анализи за водещи футболни мачове както от Англия и Европа, така и от Българското Първенство, включително Висшата Лига на Англия, Шампионската Лига и Българската Първа Лига. Достъп до състави на отборите, статистика на живо, класиране в лигите и сравнения "един срещу един" (H2H), които ти помагат да подобриш твоите фишове. След като мачът започне, следи развитието му на живо с нашия тракър на игрището.

LIVESCORE BET СКУАДРА
Влизай в играта всеки ден през седмицата, за да разкриеш пет играчи за твоята Скуадра, а головете, отбелязани от тях, в избрани от нас мачове през уикенда, ще се зачитат за парични награди, които предлагаме!

ЗАЛАГАНЕ НА ЖИВО
Предлагаме залози на живо на спортове като футбол, волейбол, тенис, баскетбол и много други. Нашите подробни табла с резултати в LiveScore Bet те държат в течение с актуалните резултати, осигурявайки перфектна компания за залагане на живо.

КАЗИНО НА ЖИВО И КАЗИНО КЛАСИКА
Нашите маси в казиното, предлагат тръпката от Рулетка и Блекджек на живо с професионални крупиета. Имаме както популярните слот игри като 40 Super Hot Bell Link, така и Казино Джакпоти в нашето Казино!

СТОТИЦИ СПОРТНИ ПАЗАРИ ЗА ЗАЛАГАНЕ
Независимо дали залогът е на ъглови удари, картони или дузпи във Висшата Лига на Англия, или на следващ гейм в тениса, приложението за спортни залози на LiveScore Bet предлага голям избор от пазари и конкурентни коефициенти. Освен това, с бързото залагане на живо, може да се залага на победител на полувремето в баскетбола или на точки във волейбола.

ФУНКЦИИ ЗА ЗАЛАГАНЕ НА СПОРТ
С нашия Bet Builder могат да се създават персонализирани фишове в рамките на един мач или от няколко мача, правейки залагането на футбол още по-персонализирано.

ОТЛИЧНИ КОЕФИЦИЕНТИ
Чрез LiveScore Bet правим достъпни до нашите играчи стотици пазари за залагане на спортове като футбол, баскетбол, тенис, волейбол и още - от спортни залози до екшън в казиното на живо.

LiveScore Bet е приложение за спортни залози и залагане с реални пари. За пълни условия и правила, посети: lvscrbet.com/Terms-BG[3]

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/terms-of-use
Subscription terms and conditions: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/subscription-terms
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

Experience the thrill of Formula 1® with F1 TV Access. Relive race archives, enjoy exclusive shows, and dive into detailed data, all from your favorite devices.

With F1 TV Access, you can:
•        Get full exclusive access to Live Timing Data, Maps and Analysis
•        Watch F1 shows and documentaries
•        Explore over 2000 hours of historic race archives
•        Enjoy a premium ad-free experience 

For more information on F1 TV content available in your country please visit the F1 website.

For help with F1TV, please visit: https://support.f1.tv/s/?language=en_US

If you subscribe via iTunes:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current billing period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan.
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/f1-apps-terms-of-use
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet

• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

The 433 app is the ultimate football experience for every football lover. Whether you want to keep track of your team’s big match, stay up to date with all the latest news, kick back and watch some epic viral videos or simply test your footy knowledge with a variety of games… We’ve got you covered. Welcome to the home of football.


MATCH CENTRE
Find everything you need on matchday – fixtures, results, match stats, live line-ups – and get notifications when your teams score. Which team dominated possession? Who had the highest xG? How many of their shots were on target? How many yellow cards did the referee give? It’s all there, and more. 


PREDICTIONS
Think you ‘know ball’ better than your friends? Here’s your chance to prove it! Create leaderboards with your friends and go head-to-head in daily predictions of matches from across the world. Enter into the general leaderboards and compete against all 433 users, with the chance to win prizes.


WALLPAPERS
Need a new football background for your phone? This is the app for you. Wallpapers are released every week, covering all the biggest players, clubs and national sides.


QUIZZES
Put your football knowledge to the test with a series of quizzes, interactive games and brain teasers. Want to find out who knows more about football: You or your friends? You can! Add your friends, complete quizzes, and keep track of each other’s ‘ball knowledge’ with leaderboards.


NEWS
Stay on top of the news and never miss any breaking stories coming out of your favourite clubs and leagues. Keep track of your team’s transfer developments, injury updates, unmissable quotes and reactions from across the football world. Be the first to find out about trending stories or when a transfer is nearing that all important ‘Here we go!’


VIRALS
Want to see goals, saves, moments from games across the world? Want to feel the game from the fan’s perspective? Or do you just want to see some funny moments from famous players and coaches? Then look no further. Find daily uploads of viral moments from across the beautiful game!

Enjoy your outdoor activities. The app allows you to record your routes using different types of maps, both online and offline.

Keep your data private. No registration required, and no uploading of your data anywhere if you don't want to.

Use different sensors in your activities (heart rate monitor, cadence/speed/power on a bike).

Upload your activities to important sites like Strava or SICAMI.

Analyze your activities, obtaining graphs, average and maximum data, etc.

Follow routes, with alerts when you move away from the path or when you approach points of interest.

Search for routes using an online service, which will allow you to find paths anywhere.

It includes a powerful GIS tool for complex distance calculations, bearings, intersections, coordinate conversions, and more.

Share your live position with your friends and hiking companions, or with family so they can follow your trail.

It includes numerous utilities:
- Dashboard
- Compass
- Artificial horizon
- GIS tool

Lusail Tickets is a secure mobile ticketing application built on top of blockchain technology. Its’ aim is to upgrade security, reduce fraud, and digitalize your tickets purchase processes.
With Lusail Tickets, you can:
- Download your tickets instantly on your smartphone, and keep them with you anywhere you go.
- Transfer tickets to your friends or family members through the ticket transfer option using only their phone numbers. The transfer takes only few seconds.
- Access the event using your digitalized tickets in a frictionless way by just presenting your QR code to the access control point.

PLAY DIEMA XTRA е платформа, която ти дава достъп до големия спорт на компютър, мобилен телефон и таблет.
Вече няма значение къде си, когато искаш да изпиташ магията на най-зрелищните спортни събития в българския ефир, защото PLAY DIEMA XTRA ти дава неограничен достъп до каналите DIEMA SPORT и DIEMA SPORT 2. Гледай на предпочитаното от теб мобилно устройство или компютър в HD с отлично качество на изображението и удобно меню на български език.

Регистрирай се, за да ползваш приложението и да се насладиш на най-доброто от Първа и Втора Професионална Футболна Лига и Купата на България, най-оспорваните дербита от Висшата Английска лига, Чемпиъншип и FA Cup, Формула 1, атрактивен баскетбол от NBA, най-добрия български волейбол, професионален бокс и още много избрани спортни състезания от цял свят. 
Гледай спорта, който обичаш на живо, а най-зрелищните събития и на запис в 7-дневния архив, достъпен през уеб или мобилното приложение, а с AirPlay или Chromecast можеш лесно да пренесеш горещите спортни битки и на големия екран на твоя телевизор.

Приложението PLAY DIEMA XTRA може да се ползва както през WiFi, така и през мобилна 3G/4G мрежа с адаптивно качество, за да не изпуснеш и секунда от зрелището. 

При потвърждаване на покупката плащането ще бъде таксувано към iTunes акаунта Ви, след изтичането на тестовия период, ако има такъв. Абонаментът се подновява автоматично, освен ако автоматичното подновяване не бъде изключено поне 24 часа преди края на текущия абонаментен период. Абонаментът се подновява и таксува в рамките на 24 часа преди изтичането на текущия период. 
Управлението и прекратяването на абонаментите става през настройките на акаунта на потребителя. Абонаментът не може да бъде прекратен за започнал абонаментен период.
 
За повече информация вижте Общите Условия и Политиката за Поверителност на PLAY DIEMA XTRA (https://diemaxtra.nova.bg/play/tos)
DIEMAXTRA и PLAY DIEMA XTRA: Домът на големия спорт – вече навсякъде с теб! Свали приложението сега!
